text: Sulaimon Bolaji Adekunle (born 26 October 1990 in Ibadan) is a Nigerian footballer who currently plays for Bylis Ballsh in the Albanian Superliga.Adekunle, një nigerian që beson te kthesa e fierakëve ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:KF Apolonia Fier players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Nigerian expatriates in Albania Category:Expatriate footballers in Albania Category:Yoruba sportspeople Category:Association football defenders
title: Sulaimon Adekunle
